item.title: The IMS Company
item.description:
Led a project to replicate entertainment media (music, video and games) from a single media source to hundreds of inÂ­flight entertainment units with minimal redundancy. Contributed to the design and development of an inflight entertainment server.

Perl, Python, C/C++ and Java
